There are doors which cannot be opened with a key. To open them, you will have to defeat the monsters which guard them.
After you make a purchase from a merchant, go talk to him again because he will tell you some important information.
I heard that there are two hidden red keys hidden in this area.
Back
Many knights had failed to pass this area because of those Rock Monsters. Their defenses are just too high. Maybe you should increase your offense at the altar a few time in this area.
Do you know the Archmage in this area is the owner of this tower? He is way too strong for you now. Fighting him is suicide. You should go to higher floors and get stronger first.
It is said that there is a hidden message in this floor.
At this current stage, if you have 1500 health, 80 attack, 98 defense, 5 yellow keys and 1 blue key, you are almost ideal.
The attack power of the swordsmen is too high. You should only fight them when you can one shot them, or you will lose a lot of health.
More haste, less speed.
If you find the four secret tunnels in this floor, you will be able to go upstairs without fighting strong enemies.
This floor is an item warehouse, but to get the treasure, you will have to use the mattock.
At three o\'clock, the secret treasure which allows you to teleport three time will appear.

The magic powers of Mages allows them to attack from a distance, so don\'t get near them. The magic power of Demon Sergeant cannot work alone, but when they appear in pairs, they can form an invisible demon gate which cut your health in half when you pass by.
The 44th floor is in a different dimension, and you can\'t get there with stairs. But you may try teleporting.
There is a secret about the 41st floor - it is perfectly symmetrical even though it doesn't seem to be.
The shape of five on a dice is actually an ancient symbol for sealing magic. Remember the symbol because it will help you in the future.
Good luck young man!

This tower consists of 50 floors. Every 10 floors form one area, and each area has one boss guarding the entrance to the next area. To proceed, you must defeat these bosses.
When you offer gold in exchange for strength at an alter, you should put your priority on defense. However, you cannot completely ignore offense either.
Have you found the secret tunnels on the 9th, 16th, and 18th floor? I heard that there are more of them on higher floors.
Back

When you carry a cross, your attacks will be twice as effective against zombies and the Vampire, and I don\'t think you can defeat the Vampire without it. There is a cross hidden on floors higher than this one.
Back
Even though the tower is said to have 50 floors, I have never heard anyone reaching to the 50th floor.
There is never a gate without Gate-Keepers, and there is always a gate when you see Gate-Keepers.
There is a Lucky Gold hidden in this tower. If you carry it with you, you will get twice as much money from battles.
I heard that the Sacred Shield can protect you against all kinds of magic powers. But I also heard that this shield is hidden on a floor which doesn't exist.
I heard that to kill the Dragon, you must have a holy sword, a holy shield, and most importantly the Dragonsbane, which doubles your attack against the Dragon.
Keep it secret, and don\'t tell others
